review_body: Awesome Language Learning App But.. I am using this app for my Spanish and it is VERY helpful. I LOVE the SRS feature. However, the pronunciation feature is able to be used on the initial word on the front of the flash card. If it could be used on the word that gets revealed, that would be AMAZING; because sometimes you don’t want the Spanish word first, you want the English word, THEN the revealed Spanish word with pronunciation. If you could make this change, that would be AWESOME! Thanks! :)
must sign up another app that makes you sign up... for flashcards? Yeah, how about no. 1 star.

Great but.. I was wondering if you were going to implement an easier way to import new vocabulary cards. Like importing my anki decks into this app is quite a hassle, having to write it down on my phone by hand for over 7000+ cards and sentences. Please help me and thanks.
Best application The best application i have ever seen that used leitner methods. I really recommend it to everyone who wants learn another language
Fantastic This is a fantastic app. I tried Anki but found it unintuitive. If you want something like Anki but better get this
Absolutely beneficial This app does exactly what it says it does. It’s helping me memorize and recall words and definitions
Nice app Use it to learn Spanish. Just what I need and easy to use
Nice But need to add more features in language and plz support arabic
Free wow Get this now as it is still free
Good, but needs work I love that the app offers mini games to practice words, something that a lot of language learning apps don’t have. However, when I tried to make a deck, it was very confusing!
no tricks app does what it’s supposed to do very well.
Ulangi I love it!!! It’s perfect to learn English or other languages.
by and large the only and the best and unbelievably free
